about.title: About {commercialName}
about.subtitle: Empowering wedding planners to create unforgettable experiences

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At {commercialName}, we believe every wedding should be a stress-free celebration of love. Our mission is to empower wedding planners with the tools they need to deliver exceptional service to their couples, while simplifying guest management and communication.

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: {commercialName} was born from the real challenges faced by wedding planners managing multiple events simultaneously. We saw how planners struggled with spreadsheets, multiple communication channels, and tracking RSVPs across different couples.
story.content2: We built {commercialName} as a comprehensive platform that brings everything together—from guest management to invitations to gift tracking—all in one elegant, easy-to-use system designed specifically for wedding professionals.

items.title: Simplicity
items.content: We believe powerful tools should be easy to use. Every feature is designed to save time and reduce complexity.

items.title: Reliability
items.content: Your couples trust you with their special day. We ensure our platform is always available when you need it.

items.title: Innovation
items.content: We continuously improve and adapt to the evolving needs of wedding professionals and their clients.

items.title: Support
items.content: Your success is our success. We're here to help you every step of the way with dedicated support.

cta.title: Ready to transform your wedding planning business?

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At {commercialName}, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our wedding management platform.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We collect the following types of information:
items: Contact information (name, email, phone) provided by wedding planners and admins
Wedding guest information managed through our platform
Usage data and analytics to improve our service
Authentication information through OAuth providers (Google, Facebook, Microsoft)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
items: To provide and maintain our wedding management services
To send invitations, reminders, and communications on behalf of wedding planners
To track RSVPs and manage guest lists
To improve our platform and develop new features

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We use secure OAuth authentication and never store passwords directly. Access to data is strictly controlled and limited to authorized personnel only.

userRights.title: Your Rights
items: Access your personal data at any time
Request deletion of your data (subject to legal requirements)
Export your data in a standard format

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please

docs.title: Documentation
docs.subtitle: Everything you need to know about {commercialName}

overview.title: What is {commercialName}?
overview.content1: {commercialName} is a comprehensive wedding management platform designed specifically for wedding planners. It provides a complete solution for managing multiple weddings simultaneously, from guest list management to invitations to gift tracking.
overview.content2: Built with a multi-tenant architecture, {commercialName} allows wedding planners to manage multiple couples at once, while giving each couple secure access to their own wedding data through an intuitive interface.

planner.title: Wedding Planners
planner.content: Professional wedding planners who manage multiple weddings and need a centralized platform to handle all aspects of guest management, communication, and coordination.

couple.title: Wedding Couples
couple.content: Couples get free access granted by their planner to manage their wedding guest list, track RSVPs, and communicate with their guests through multiple channels.

guest.title: Wedding Guests
guest.content: Guests receive magic links via WhatsApp, email, or SMS to RSVP without needing to create accounts—making the process as simple as possible.

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
items: Family-based guest management with Excel import/export
Multi-channel invitations (WhatsApp, Email, SMS) in 5 languages
Magic link authentication for guests—no passwords needed
Real-time RSVP tracking with activity notifications
Gift tracking with automated or manual payment confirmation

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.content: Ready to streamline your wedding planning business? Start with our free 14-day trial to explore all features with your first wedding. No credit card required.
